column5: Anyone fished twin lakes air out of Nakina,ON? If so, which lakes, and how was the fishing.???

We have used TwinLakes for over 10yrs.Bill&Michele are very professional,operate safely and do everything they possibly can to make your trip work. They use Nakina Air,which many outfitters do,and its also a very safe and well organized operation. The lakes they use(go to their website) are ALL very productive.We have NEVER had a bad trip. Most of their lakes are not very far,short flights,good boats,motors,lots of fuel. I can't say enough!
